Package com.duocardgame

Interface IGameMediator

All Known Implementing Classes:
DuoCardGame
public interface IGameMediator
Defines the methods that a game mediator must implement to manage game flow, including player turns, deck handling, dealer selection, and round control.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    endRound()
    Ends the current round.
    Player
    getCurrentPlayer()
    Returns the current player whose turn it is.
    Deck
    getDeck()
    Returns a copy of the current deck.
    void
    moveToNextPlayer()
    Advances the game to the next player's turn.
    Player
    selectDealer()
    Selects the dealer for the game.
    void
    setDeck(Deck deck)
    Sets the current deck.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentPlayer

      Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the current player whose turn it is.
      Returns:
      the current Player

    • moveToNextPlayer

      void moveToNextPlayer()
      Advances the game to the next player's turn.

    • getDeck

      Deck getDeck()
      Returns a copy of the current deck.

      This method provides a defensive copy to prevent external modification of the deck.

      Returns:
      a copy of the current Deck

    • setDeck

      void setDeck(Deck deck)
      Sets the current deck.

      The provided deck is stored as a defensive copy to avoid direct external modifications.

      Parameters:
      deck - the new deck to set

    • selectDealer

      Player selectDealer()
      Selects the dealer for the game.

      Each player draws a card and the one with the highest scoring card is selected as the dealer.

      Returns:
      the Player chosen as the dealer

    • endRound

      void endRound()
      Ends the current round.
